release_note: New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.

New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be. Edit your videos with your words! Our Copilot now provides you with up to four variations so you can pick the best edit for your videos. We included more overlays for your Copilot creations! From neon to grunge to confetti overlays there is no overlay limits to what you can add to your Copilot edits. The Copilot feature is only available to United States creators.

Edit your videos with your words! Our Copilot now provides you with up to four variations so you can pick the best edit for your videos. We included more overlays for your Copilot creations! From neon to grunge to confetti overlays there is no overlay limits to what you can add to your Copilot edits. The Copilot feature is only available to United States creators. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.

Use your imagination to edit your videos and watch your words turn into aesthetic visuals with 24FPS Copilot! 24FPS Copilot utilizes artificial general intelligence to help apply the edits you would like to see on your videos. The 24FPS Copilot feature is currently only available to United States creators. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.

Use your imagination to edit your videos and watch your words turn into aesthetic visuals with 24FPS Copilot! 24FPS Copilot utilizes artificial general intelligence to help apply the edits you would like to see on your videos. The 24FPS Copilot feature is currently only available to United States creators. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.

Are you in love with the vintage aesthetic Try our NEW film effects for an authentic touch of nostalgia! Add a classy vintage look to your videos with TRI X. Get ready for summer and add a touch of warmth to your videos with LOMO HUES. Four is better than one! Splice your videos into 4 vintage inspired frames with SPLICE FILM. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.
New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your video editing experience as smooth as can be.

24FPS has a fresh new look! We improved our app experience and added many more unique effects for different vibes. Try out barbiecore weirdcore gorecore in the app. More effects will be added in bi weekly update. Enjoy!

Easily DISCOVER new video effects by aesthetics with: Cinematic Kawaii Solar Vibe Mood Ring and Retro. Add a touch of shiny Y2K nostalgia to your videos with Y2K PAPER! Combining chrome colors and a magazine texture your videos will look fresh out of an editorial. Transform yourself into a colorful aura with LUNAR SHIFT! A swirling mix of pinks and blues brings a sweet charm to your videos Sparkle like there s no tomorrow with BLING! Our newest glitter effect will have your videos shining like a star. Feel cyberpunk culture with DIGITAL SPACE! This effect shifts between shades of chrome and adds a dope cyber vibe to all your videos.

Looking to add a nostalgic touch to your videos Try FILM REEL for an authentic vintage look on your videos. Travel through cyberspace with CYBERCAR! Bring all the bright and glitchy cyber vibes to your videos. Celebrate the bloom of a new season with butterflies. BUTTERFLY DREAM adds a lively burst of sparkles and butterflies to your content. Highlight your videos with our new Cinematic filters! These HDR filters will add a crisp and tender feel to all your videos. Easily organize your saved Collections with Sort. You are now able to sort your collections by Date Added and Most Popular! New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your editing experience as smooth as can be.

Let your videos stand out even more with our new Trending! These video filters add a fresh and unique look to your videos that ll have everyone hitting replay! New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your editing experience as smooth as can be.

Never lose track of your saved filters with Collections! You are now able to organize your filters into custom Collections. These collections can also be made public to share on your profile. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your editing experience as smooth as can be.

Show some love for your favorite filters! You are now able to like filters by Creators with the new like feature. You can also view all your liked filters in the Profile panel. Never miss a thing! Filter notifications in our new Activity Center have been updated so you stay up to date with the latest activity on your filters. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your editing experience as smooth as can be.

Show some love for your favorite filters! You are now able to like filters by Creators with the new like feature. You can also view all your liked filters in the Profile panel. Never miss a thing! Filter notifications in our new Activity Center have been updated so you stay up to date with the latest activity on your filters. New UI improvements and bug fixes to make your editing experience as smooth as can be.

Make your profile stand out with our newly updated Creator profile. Don t miss out on new filters by your favorite creators! You can now follow creator profiles and be notified when they have published new filters. Discover new filters easily with our new Creator Spotlight which highlights trending creators and their profiles. Never miss a thing! Find out who published a new filter who followed you and stay up to date on 24FPS news with our new Activity Center.

The new Polarr 24FPS is here! In this release we revamped the entire app to make finding managing and using unique Polarr filters easier than ever. Brand new interface to browse and use filters. New search function to discover millions of filters made by creators. Filters with overlays and segmentation are now supported for video Available for iPhone X devices and higher .

Bug fixes and improvements

24FPS 3.0 lets you focus on discovering new filters made by creators and building your personal aesthetic library so that all your edited videos can have a consistent personal touch. This release marks a new era for our app with many more unique and exciting features coming soon. Band new filter discovery experience to build your visual aesthetics Introduced profile tab to keep all your filters in one place Enhanced editing flow for easier video importing and modifications
You can now use your Polarr account to sync all your Styles from the Polarr app to 24FPS. Your subscription to 24FPS will now also unlock the Polarr app for free!
Improved discovery experience for Styles Stability improvements and bug fixes
Fixed scrolling issues in style page
Bug fixes and improvements
Fixed an issue where zooming crashes the app.
UI improvements Bug fixes
Recording controls are now less cluttered Various improvements in using Polarr Styles Bug fixes

You deserve nothing but the biggest and best which is why this update makes the app bigger and better than ever. Update to find the ability to import nearly everything the power to edit photos and so much more. New: Import photos GIFs and Live Photos. You can import pretty much anything but mostly the things we literally just mentioned. New: Edit photos. You can now edit photos with your favorite LUTs and make adjustments. New: Light mode. Everyone else is introducing dark mode but we did that first. So we give you light to balance things out. New: More color! Our UI has a splash of paint throughout. New: LUT packs for November. Members go find out what s new! Fixed: Be gone bugs go away! Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

Here s a little update for you that fixes some bugs! New: Full screen recording for iPhone X and up Fixed: A bug that resulted in exported videos being choppy Fixed: Stretching issues on iPads Fixed: Various bug fixes Now go out and create! Tag us polarr in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

New month new update. Update the app to get the latest movie LUTs and improvements to the editor. New: All your unfiltered videos save automatically now so never lose your recording again! New: Filter strength slider for more control with LUTs New: 4 new movie packs for members to celebrate this spooky month New: Tap a filter in the filter panel to unselect it Enhanced: We improved timeline navigation with various UI and UX fixes to make it easier than ever to use Fixed: Various bug fixes Now go out and create! Tag us polarr in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

This update brings a redesign to the editing panel. You can now tap any clip to see the available adjustments for it. All your favorite tools are still there. These changes make the editing panel flow faster. New: The app is now primed and ready for iOS 13. New: Tap a clip to see the available adjustments. Fixed: This bug that bug all the bugs. Now go out and create! Tag us polarr in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

It s a new month so you get some new movie packs! Grab this update and see what s new : New: Another month means three new movie packs. Your hints for which movies are next:1 red balloon space pit and a kitty mobile. Fixed: Old Polarr filters would crash the app on import. That does not happen anymore. Fixed: You can now drag and drop timeline bubbles. Fixed: When you trim the player it now previews where you re trimming. Fixed: Drag and drop has a placeholder effect so you can understand where you ll place the clip. Now go out and create! Tag us polarr in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

We ve revamped the timeline. Splitting is better. Trimming is better. Everything about it is better. Update and explore the new timeline while editing your videos in 24FPS. We ve also added a retime button so you can change the speed of clips. And of course tons of bug fixes for you because you deserve the best. New: Revamped timeline New: Retime button to speed up or slow down time Fixed: Polarr filter importing fixes Fixed: Polarr filter performance improvement Fixed: Exporting improvements Now go out and create! Tag us polarr in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs Then send an email to support polarr.co.

Fixed: Various bug have squashed in this release Missed reading the update for 1.1.2 We added support for a ton of languages and added 3 new LUT packs in that update. Check it out! We would love to hear from you! Email us support polarr.co with any feedback or bugs you find. Don t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram polarr .

You can put away your universal translator. 24FPS is going global with this update! New: 24FPS now supports your language New: New month new LUTs! Open the app to see the three latest movie packs we added. Fixed: Miscellaneous bug fixes We would love to hear from you! Email us support polarr.co with any feedback or bugs you find. Don t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram polarr .

New: 24FPS now supports video adjustment with curves! New: Change the start time of any song you select and more music improvements. We would love to hear from you! Email us support polarr.co with any feedback or bugs you find. Don t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram polarr .

New: 24FPS now supports video adjustment in exposure temperature tint HSL saturation vibrance highlights shadows whites blacks and vignette! Fixed: Playback issues with Apple Music. Email us support polarr.co with any feedback or bugs you find. Don t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram polarr .

More stability improvements and bug fixes throughout the app For Polarr Photo Editor fans we re adding more advanced video editing options to 24FPS in the coming weeks! Look forward to editing options for filters color adjustments and light adjustments similar to Polarr over the next few weeks. Stay tuned! Email us support polarr.co if you find any new bugs or need help with anything! Include the hashtag 24FPS and tag Polarrist in your videos so we can see what you re creating!

More stability improvements and bug fixes in the video editing mode. For Polarr Photo Editor fans we re adding more advanced video editing options for filters color and light adjustments similar to Polarr over the next few weeks. Stay tuned! Added 2.35:1 ratio for recording.

Reduced memory consumption so that it works smoother on the phone with less memory related crashes. Resolved multiple reported bugs and issues on editing video timeline as well as other crashes. Next up: we re working on most advanced color adjustments in the editing screen. Stay tuned.
This update includes bug fixes. Because the app is newly launched our team is closely monitoring all bugs and crashes. Please bear with us. We re at full speed fixing them through out the week.
